#summary Overview of JS files used in the extension.
= Introduction =
Our web-to-print extension uses a number a JS scripts and plugins. It is mostly based on jQuery. 


= ajaxupload.js =
Used for asynchronous uploading of user images on the customisation page.

Original script sourced from: http://valums.com/ajax-upload/

= colorpicker.js =
Generates and controls a color picker pop-up. Saves the selected value in one of input fields to be sent to ZP.

Depends on _colorpicker.css_ and images from _colorpicker_ directory

Original script sourced from: 

= jquery-1.3.2.min.js =
jQuery javascript library.

Source: http://jquery.com/

= jquery-jcrop.min.js =
JCrop is jquery plugin for cropping images.

Depends on _jquery.jcrop.css_
Source: http://deepliquid.com/content/Jcrop.html

= jquery-qtip-1.0.0-rc3.min.js =
Qtip is jquery plugin for nice tooltips. Qtip is used for showing tooltips for user input fields.

Source: http://craigsworks.com

= jquery-ui-1.7.2.custom.min.js =
jQuery UI library. It is used for color picker.

Source: http://jqueryui.com/

= jquery.fancybox-1.2.6.pack.js =
Fancybox is jQuery plugin to show in-page dialogs. Is used to show full size images for previews.

Depends on _jquery.fancybox-1.2.6.css_ and images from _fancybox_ directory.
Source: http://fancybox.net

= zp-image-edit.js =
This file is used in ZetaPrints' image editor.

Depends on _zp-image-edit.css_

= zp-personalization-form.js =
This file is used for ZetaPrints' personalization form.

Depends on _zp-style.css_
